p: All the tests were carried out in triplicate. The results were expressed as arithmetic mean values ± standard deviation, and analyzed by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Tukey HSD (honest significant difference) test with α = 0.05 to determine whether there is a statistically significant difference among the results. The analysis was carried out by Statistical Package for the Social Sciences (SPSS) version 18.0.
